properties.name: bf.scheduler.source-feed-update-enabled
properties.description: Enables scheduled update of source feeds content

properties.name: bf.scheduler.source-feed-update-interval-minutes
properties.description: An interval for running scheduled update of source feeds content, in minutes

properties.name: bf.async.core-pool-size
properties.description: Default core pool size for app's async executor

properties.name: bf.async.max-pool-size
properties.description: Max pool size for app's async executor

properties.name: bf.data.enable-initial-data-import
properties.description: Enables the importing of initial data into application
